run.var¶

class run.var.Var(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: run.task.task.Task

meta_cache¶

Var’s caching status (enabled or disabled).

If meta_cache is True var caches results after first invocation.

This property is:

  • initable/writable
  • inherited from module

run.var.ValueVar¶
class run.var.var(**kwargs)¶

Bases: run.task.task_function.task

Make var from method with default kwargs to invoke.

  • as function:

    var = var(method, **kwargs)

  • as decorator:

    @var(**kwargs)
def method(self):
    pass
